project_descr: Improving the Capacity of the NCCMD in developing and implementing startegies for management development of Iraqi Public Sector Institutions

outputs.output_descr:
1-  Staff capacity to mainstream gender in all programming activities built.
2- Gender audit completed and gender mainstreaming strategy complete with the result framework.
3- Gender team consisting of gender focal point reporting more than one unit established.
4- Documentation of the best and lessons learnt developed and shared.
5- Gender consideration mainstreamed within UNDP Iraq CO programme project
